name: Wario Landâ„¢ 4
description: Original Release Date: November 2001 "Hey! You! Yeah, you! Listen up when Wario's talking to you! I just read about this legendary Pyramid of Gold, and you're gonna help me go explore it. There's lots of treasure in there for the taking, and I want it all. I'm sure there are gonna be all kinds of weird enemies and big, bad bosses, so if you don't think you can hack it, put the game down now. I don't want any losers making me jump into bottomless pits, you hear me?" See Wario in all his greedy glory as he explores vivid worlds! Flex your muscles! Wario is no longer immortal, so you'll have your work cut out for you as you roll, punch, and jump your way through tougher and tougher challenges. Wario will get stung by bees, bitten by bats, zombified, set on fire, and much more--what a way to make a living! Over 20 enormous stages await! Hunt down CDs for your listening pleasure, or collect treasure to spend on all-new items that you can use against the most bizarre bosses ever!
